info.name: Google.com - Make Sponsored Ads More Visible
info.description: Makes sponsored ads easier to see - and avoid (or look at if you want)
info.additionalInfo: After a few random searches pulling up sponsored search results that actually did throw me off, I've gotten fed up and decided to make my first userstyle - it's simple, really - changes that now really light-gray box into a more visible box - a bright red-orange so you can see those results now, to make it easier to find/avoid.
